entries.meaning: (uncountable) The state or quality of being sordid.
examples: Every possible care was taken of him, and in a day or two he was able to walk into the study again, where he sat gazing at the sordidness and unneatness of the apartment, the strange festoons and drapery of spiders' webs,  […]

entries.meaning: (countable) The result or product of being sordid.
